messages.content: Your manager sounds like an idiot. Not saying he/she is. Just sounds like it from this.
Everyone in this video is annoying. This seems like a terrible place to go hang out.
Because physical contact promotes bonding. Healthy relationships increase both partner's wellbeing. Routine can be frustrating. Especially when you want to try something new.
R&M is still a good show but it's fans have driven it to Fortnite levels of annoyance.

Every day in everyway. If I am to happy with anything next thing I know I'm actively destroying it.
